GSD.description:
md-raid10: fix KASAN warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0f4d18cbea4a6e37a05fd8ee2887439f85211110. For more details please see the references link.
